actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to clarify the jurisdiction of certain courts with respect to public schools.

summary.text: Transfers from Federal to State courts jurisdiction to enter decrees requiring the transportation of students or teachers to carry out a plan of racial desegregation, when such cases arise within a State. Vests appellate jurisdiction of such cases in the Supreme Court of the United States by writ of certiorari from the highest State or territorial court exercising such jurisdiction. Terminates the order of any Federal court requiring the transportation of students and teachers to carry out a plan of racial desegregation. Directs any State court of appropriate jurisdiction to assume jurisdiction of such cases upon application of a party.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the jurisdiction of certain courts with respect to public schools.
